description: It doesn't work for me but I really want to test it.

Installation went fine and first start showed settings box with (I presume) defaults? However, on clicking 'ok' everything disappeared. Since then each start has showed a black window which has then disappeared. 

Having recently moved to linux from windows, it is largely a good experience but I really miss 'Everything' and need a linux replacement for it.
summary: Hopeful - but failed-needs further work - Please!

description:
Not much point to an app that just does not work. As previously stated, there is a setup box to choose preferences and then program (or something in a black box) runs for half a second.
I too would love something that works like 'Everything' in Ubuntu.
I'm on 20.04
